uploadTips: Pick pictures or Drag and drop them
title: My Stickers
maxsize: The size of sticker images should less than {{size}}.
filetype: Only image files are supported (GIF JPG PNG ...)
tenantsEmptyTips:
You can use Org-Wide Stickers, but it's empty here.
Only administrators (Global Administrator, Teams Administrator, Office Apps Administrator, or Exchange Administrator) can upload stickers for all users in your organization.
Please contact your admin to upload ♥
loginDescription:
The Org-Wide Stickers feature needs the Administrator's verification.
 ① Enable: Global Admin clicks the button then signs in and consents
 ② Manage: Global Admin and Teams Admin can change those stickers.
 ③ Use: All members in this organization can use the Org-Wide stickers.
 * tips: This app only needs id-token permission for login.
error_EXPIRE: The session expires. Please reopen this page in Teams.
